original_text: and had large supplies in the towns of Judah. He also kept experienced fighting men in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 유다 여러 성에 공사를 많이 하고 또 예루살렘에 크게 용맹스러운 군사를 두었으니

sentences.original_text: and had large supplies in the towns of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 여러 성읍에 큰 비축물을 두었고

sentences.original_text: He also kept experienced fighting men in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 예루살렘에 경험 많는 군인들을 두었더라
